attributes.action: Remove this archaic government for a New Democracy and a way forward for everyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The governments in the past 30 years has not achieved anything new. Our political system is old and requires reform. Vote if you consider there is no current political party worthy of governing the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
